mapper.select: select element_name, value from T_CXFX_MAIN_CQU where model_name='社会效益' and orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by element_name
select element_name, value from T_CXFX_MAIN_CQU where model_name='企业效益' and orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by element_name
select element_name, value from T_CXFX_MAIN_CQU where model_name='运维成本' and orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by element_name
